Herses are the chiefs of MidgÃ¥rd. Human Herses are common, but they are not allowed to perform religious activities. Herses are armored in chainmail hauberks and command the human contingent of Vanheim's armies. They have learned the skills of the Vanir and are able to sail across oceans.
